thread.title: Rita Ora eats PIZZA at 8am on Radio 1 Breakfast show | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Rita Ora eats PIZZA at 8am on Radio 1 Breakfast show | Daily Mail Online

author: Ryan Smith For Mailonline
title: Rita Ora eats PIZZA at 8am on Radio 1 Breakfast show | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share She wrote: 'When the crew dem come together coz the Brits just took it out of us...breakfast of champions [sic].' The star also took some time out to assure listeners that while she was late for the show, she wasn't hungover in the slightest, thanks to her largely teetotal night. Tardy for the party: The Hot Right Now singer arrived for her guest-hosting gig half an hour late Stylish: She was in typically eye-catching style as she stepped out of her chauffeur-driven car Running late! Rita assured BFF Nick was on her way as he tweeted that he was waiting for her MNaking waves: She took to Twitter to promote her appearance to her army of followers She said: 'Can I just confirm I didn't have one drop of alcohol. I had a sip of champagne and it made my breath smell funny and then I stopped!' But it appeared that Stormzy's culinary delight - a delivery of several boxes of pizza - proved to be the real icing on the cake for Rita. A video was shared of her squealing with delight as the cheesy treats were carried into the studio, compliments of the chart-topping south Londoner. As Rita's BFF Nick manned the show ahead of her arrival, he Tweeted: 'It's the morning after the night before... Just waiting for @RitaOra to arrive...' Chowing down: Rita appeared to be decidedly excited with her unconventional 8am meal After the after-party: Despite arriving before the crack of dawn, she donned sunglasses Eclectic style: She wore a striped blouse with a long tail, teamed with flared cropped jeans She quickly responded on the micro-blogging site, assuring: 'I'm coming!' On arrival, she shared a video of herself on social media, saying: 'So I made it! Hello, guys. It's me, Rita Ora and welcome to my show with my co-host, Nicholas Grimashaw... 'No, I'm joking. Thank you for having me again, Nick and Radio 1. I love you guys and I can't wait to talk to you all.' Despite arriving at the studios well before the crack of dawn, the I Will Never Let You Down hitmaker hid her eyes behind a pair of oversized sunglasses. True blue: The singer topped her ensemble with a stylish blue leather jacket as she arrived Her ensemble was typically eye-catching, consisting of a striped blouse with a long tail, which she teamed with flared cropped jeans and a blue leather jacket. The beauty's brunette tresses were slicked back, while gold hoop earrings and a light dusting of makeup added a touch of glamour to her look. Her look stood in stark contrast to her ensemble the night before at the BRIT Awards, where she commanded attention in a sweeping semi-sheer gown as she sashayed across the red carpet upon her arrival outside the city's O2 Arena. Heavily embellished and featuring an elegant, off-the-shoulder detail, Rita's extravagant choice of attire stood out on a night dedicated to bold fashion statements. A pleated train ensured the singer was not overshadowed as she posed for photos outside the cavernous venue. Hot Right Now: Rita she stood out as the 37th edition of the BRIT Awards kicked off in London on Wednesday evening Strong look: The singer, 26, commanded attention in a sweeping semi-sheer gown as she sashayed across the red carpet upon her arrival outside the city's O2 Arena Stand out show: Heavily embellished and featuring an elegant, off-the-shoulder detail, Rita's extravagant choice of attire stood out on a night dedicated to bold fashion statements Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
